<title level="1" pfs="">[Animated Tea Cart](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2094)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Construct](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Arcana](/Skills.aspx?ID=2), [Crafting](/Skills.aspx?ID=4)): DC 26

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 24

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 21
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 8">[Animated Tea Cart](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2094)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="N" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Construct" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=35" />
<trait label="Mindless" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=108" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #183: Field of Maidens](/Sources.aspx?ID=145) pg. 51</row>

**Perception** +13; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12)

**Languages**

**Skills**
[Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +18, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +16

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +4

**Dex** +6

**Con** +4

**Int** -5

**Wis** +0

**Cha** -5
</row>

**Items**
dishes

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 28 (24 when broken, construct armor)

**Fort** +16 

**Ref** +18 

**Will** +12 

</row>

**HP** 120

**Immunities**
bleed, [death](/Traits.aspx?ID=40) effects, [disease](/Traits.aspx?ID=46), [doomed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=9), [drained](/Conditions.aspx?ID=10), [fatigued](/Conditions.aspx?ID=15), [healing](/Traits.aspx?ID=89), [mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106), [necromancy](/Traits.aspx?ID=117), [nonlethal](/Traits.aspx?ID=188) attacks, [paralyzed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=28), [poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=126), [sickened](/Conditions.aspx?ID=34), [unconscious](/Conditions.aspx?ID=38)

**Construct Armor** Like normal objects, an animated tea cart has Hardness. This Hardness reduces any damage the tea cart takes by an amount equal to the Hardness. Once an animated tea cart is reduced to fewer than half its Hit Points, or immediately upon being damaged by a critical hit, its construct armor breaks, removing the Hardness and reducing its Armor Class to 24.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 25 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
slam +15 ([Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103)),
**Damage** 2d8+9 bludgeoning

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
dish +15 ([Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [range increment 30 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=248), [versatile P and S](/Traits.aspx?ID=200)),
**Damage** 2d6+8 bludgeoning

**Scald** <actions string="Single Action" />  **Frequency** once per round; **Effect** The tea cart ejects piping-hot tea in a 15-foot cone that deals 5d6 fire damage (DC 26 [basic](/Rules.aspx?ID=329) Reflex save).

</column>
name: Animated Tea Cart

text: Animated Tea Cart Recall Knowledge - Construct (Arcana, Crafting): DC 26 Unspecific Lore : DC 24 Specific Lore : DC 21 Animated Tea Cart Source Pathfinder #183: Field of Maidens pg. 51 Perception +13; darkvision Languages Skills Athletics +18, Stealth +16 Str +4 Dex +6 Con +4 Int -5 Wis +0 Cha -5 Items dishes --- AC 28 (24 when broken, construct armor) Fort +16 Ref +18 Will +12 HP 120 Immunities bleed, death effects, disease, doomed, drained, fatigued, healing, mental, necromancy, nonlethal attacks, paralyzed, poison, sickened, unconscious Construct Armor Like normal objects, an animated tea cart has Hardness. This Hardness reduces any damage the tea cart takes by an amount equal to the Hardness. Once an animated tea cart is reduced to fewer than half its Hit Points, or immediately upon being damaged by a critical hit, its construct armor breaks, removing the Hardness and reducing its Armor Class to 24. --- Speed 25 feet Melee Single Action slam +15 (Magical), Damage 2d8+9 bludgeoning Ranged Single Action dish +15 (Magical, range increment 30 feet, versatile P and S), Damage 2d6+8 bludgeoning Scald Single Action Frequency once per round; Effect The tea cart ejects piping-hot tea in a 15-foot cone that deals 5d6 fire damage (DC 26 basic Reflex save).
